scripts.prestart: java -jar /usr/local/lib/antlr-4.13.1-complete.jar -Dlanguage=JavaScript grammar/biesVMLexer.g4 &&  java -jar /usr/local/lib/antlr-4.13.1-complete.jar -Dlanguage=JavaScript grammar/biesVMParser.g4 && mv grammar/biesVMLexer.js output/ && mv grammar/biesVMParser.js output/ && mv grammar/biesVMParserListener.js output/
